PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2024/00375--- Address: Strathaird Court39 Grove RoadSuttonSM1 2AH--- Proposal: Non material amendment to approved application DM2020/01926 which allowed the 'Application to vary condition 1 (approved drawings) of planning permission Ref: DM2019/00014 for the "Provision of an additional 2 self-contained flats within the roofspace through the removal of existing roof and replacement with new roof at increased height involving two dormer windows to the front, a dormer extension at the rear, a balcony at the front and rooflights to flank elevations and erection of detached single storey refuse and cycle stores and creation of 3 vehicular parking bays to site frontage involving alterations to existing access arrangements and new front boundary wall" to allow a new lead roof over the front and rear bays, the 2no. dormers to the front of the property to become a single large dormer and the roof creating the parapet of the balcony at the top floor front elevation dormer to be removed,' to allow a reduction vehicular parking bays from 3 to 2.--- Status: GTD--- Decision: GTD--- Date Decision Issued: 05-APR-24---
